title: Game-Based Maritime Safety Training: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic maritime safety regulations and ship operation procedures
context.additional_context: Game-based learning environment utilizing mathematical modeling and simulation for in-service professionals, including real-time collaborative activities via personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Enhance risk assessment and decision-making capabilities to over 80% accuracy through a game-based maritime accident scenario simulation

Learners formulate response strategies for three real emergency scenarios using wave coefficient calculations and collision avoidance angle analysis modeling, submitting reports meeting ≥4 of 5 expert review criteria.
Execute maritime accident prevention protocols with over 90% participation through team-based game activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
